thread.title: Santoshi, Sushila win gold at Commonwealth Weightlifting
thread.title_full: Santoshi, Sushila win gold at Commonwealth Weightlifting - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Santoshi, Sushila win gold at Commonwealth Weightlifting
text:
NEW DELHI: Indian weightlifters Matsa Santoshi and Sushila Chanu have won gold medal at the ongoing Commonwealth Youth, Junior and Senior Championship being held at Pune.
Around 139 weightlifters from 22 countries have been competing in the event where the two Railway girls have won gold medal for the country.
Another Railways athlete Mirabai Chanu has won silver medal in her category.
